name: Wave Surfer
description:
Hey, I'm Joey!

I was vacationing on the Palm island beach when I suddenly noticed sea monsters.

On seeing the sea monsters, I got curious and dived into the sea, not knowing what I'm gonna be dealing with. With only my surfboard to my rescue, I need to start my journey!

 

Keep up a good speed while trying to collect coconuts and score points while dodging sharks and sea monsters.

 

Come help me dodge the sea monsters and sharks whilst collecting the tender coconut boosters to find my way out!

 

Features:

  • Unique HD graphics and attractive user friendly game play
  • Totally free to install and enjoy water surfing!
  • Smooth and realistic game controls
  • 2D game
  • Offline game
